function_description: Add a label to a card
initial_state: User is viewing a card in the card view with the labels section visible.
steps: Click on the plus icon in the labels section.
Select the label(s) to assign from the list or create a new label.
Click on the `Create new label` button if creating a new one, otherwise select existing.
expected_state: The selected labels are added to the card, indicated by a tick symbol next to them.
